name: 2.13 "Battle of the Exes" Online Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was in a bad mood?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla found out her husband was getting married. She was in a bad mood because she was invited to the wedding and didn't want her ex to see her alone.

Norm.

	Carla warned everyone to leave her alone. However, Norm said to her, "Turn that frown upside down." Carla got angry and attacked Norm.

questions.text: What did Carla love about Nick?
questions.correct: The way he flexed his tattoos
options: The way he parted his hair
questions.explanation:
The way he flexed his tattoos.

	Nick didn't have many good qualities. However, Carla always seems to find something good about him, usually things that would repulse many people.

Loretta.

	Loretta was a stereotypical blonde. She was pretty clueless about everything.

questions.text: Who was Carla's date for Nick's wedding?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	At first Sam didn't want to go but after seeing Nick, he changed his mind. Nick introduced her to Loretta flaunting Loretta in front of Carla.

questions.text: When Nick talked to Carla in private, what did he say?
questions.explanation:
"I want you back."

	Nick was a lech. He just married Loretta and was already trying to get Carla back.

questions.text: What dress did Nick say Carla came to the wedding in?
questions.correct: the dress she married him in
options: the dress she first met him in
the dress from their first date
the dress he proposed to her in
questions.explanation:
the dress she married him in.

	Carla and Nick were married and had four children before they got divorced. Nick was also the father of Carla's fifth child.

Sam.

	They had been spending all that time together at the wedding and the kiss just happened. They decided that it didn't mean anything.

Dan Hedaya.

	Dan Hedaya was born in Brooklyn, NY in 1940. He often plays sleazy characters.

Jean Kasem.

	Jean Kasem was born in 1954 in New Hampshire. She married Casey Kasem in 1980.
